name: The Cubetastic Cube 2.0
description:
Cubetastic Cube 2.0 is a updated version of Cubetastic Cube (here's a link to it: The Cubetastic Cube by Blockhead manic (itch.io) ) and in this new game there's new levels which are harder, new obstacles, a new look to the menu and settings, the player has a face now,  it's a lot cuter now I think, and last and not least I added a boss fight. Well its not really a boss fight but it's like one. I might add some more updates to this game soon too. I am sorry if there's any bugs when you play so if you find a bug just comment down below. So I hope you enjoy! (I would recommend to play full screen in browser but you can't pause the game). 

new faces on player

-also if the browser game doesn't work then reload the page and if that doesn't work then just download it.
